about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in Dead End's cooperative apocalyptic adventure, Explore ruined procedurally generated cities with diverse routes, seek weapons and items to survive, and strive to reach the ultimate goal of escaping together.

Introducing the AI Director - an extraordinary dynamic force intricately shaping your journey by generating the procedural world, strategically placing obstacles, unleashing the infected, and seamlessly adjusting to your every move.

Step into an unparalleled realm of realism with our cutting-edge virtual muscles and procedural animation system. Witness the infected meet their brutal demise in a visceral and blood-soaked spectacle.


In our Procedural Campaign mode, players venture into procedurally generated campaigns, ensuring a unique experience with every playthrough. Scavenge for supplies and weapons while confronting hordes of the infected, encountering new challenges and surprises each time. Each campaign presents different routes, enemies, and items, demanding players to adapt to their surroundings for survival. Reach for the ultimate goal of escaping the infected nightmare and explore the diverse apocalyptic world along the way.


In Survival Mode, players must face never-ending hordes of infected and rely on scavenged resources to fend them off. The objective is to survive for as long as possible in a harrowing battle against the relentless undead. With each passing moment, the challenge intensifies as the infected grow more numerous. How long will you last against the unyielding onslaught?

content_descriptors.notes: Dead End includes mature content and is not suitable for all ages. The game features frequent depictions of violence, blood, and gore.

Minimum:

short_description: Explore the apocalypse of Dead End with friends in this dark and violent cooperative adventure.
